name: CMIOExtensionStreamFormat
desc: An object that describes the format of a media stream.

items.name: init(formatDescription: CMFormatDescription, maxFrameDuration: CMTime, minFrameDuration: CMTime, validFrameDurations: [CMTime]?)
items.desc: Creates a stream format with a format description and frame durations.

items.name: var minFrameDuration: CMTime
items.desc: The minimum frame duration a stream supports.

items.name: var maxFrameDuration: CMTime
items.desc: The maximum duration a stream supports.

items.name: var validFrameDurations: [CMTime]?
items.desc: An array of frame durations the stream supports.

items.name: var formatDescription: CMFormatDescription
items.desc: A description of the format of the streamâ€™s media samples.
